main.name: BTC 2.0
main.description: Following The 2.0 Trend, BTC 2.0 is born. With total supply of 210,000,000 as btc. The token has a limit supply
main.tokenbio: With total supply of 210,000,000, which is the same as BTC. BTC 2.0 would not replace BTC, we want every one to own this token just like BTC
